nodes.text: An Amulet of the Robb was a type of brown amulet. Senator Tynnra Pamlo of Taris wore one such amulet in 0 BBY. It shared its name with the Clone Wars-era Tarisian Senator Kin Robb and New Republic Tarisian Senator Andrithal Robb-Voti.
An Amulet of the Robb first appeared in the 2016 movie Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, and was first identified in the corresponding visual guide.
